field.label: Enable NRPE
field.help: This will activate the NRPE service.

field.label: Server Port
field.help: Set the port the daemon is listening to.

field.label: Server Address
field.help: Set the address the daemon is listening to. Empty means listen to all addresses.

field.label: Allowed Hosts
field.help: Set the list of allowed hosts which can query this system.

field.label: Allow Arguments
field.help: Enable to allow arguments sent to NRPE.
